name: Shap-e
description: Shap-E is a generative model for 3D assets. It creates implicit functions from text prompts. It was developed by OpenAI.
fullDescription:
We present Shap-E, a conditional generative model for 3D assets. Unlike recent work on 3D generative models which produce a single output representation, Shap-E directly generates the parameters of implicit functions that can be rendered as both textured meshes and neural radiance fields. We train Shap-E in two stages: first, we train an encoder that deterministically maps 3D assets into the parameters of an implicit function; second, we train a conditional diffusion model on outputs of the [...] openai

/
shap-e



like
240
Follow

OpenAI
8.24k

Shap-E

Shap-E introduces a diffusion process that can generate a 3D image from a text prompt. It was introduced in Shap-E: Generating Conditional 3D Implicit Functions by Heewoo Jun and Alex Nichol from OpenAI.

Original repository of Shap-E can be found here: https://github.com/openai/shap-e.

The authors of Shap-E didn't author this model card. They provide a separate model card here.

Introduction

The abstract of the Shap-E paper: [...] @misc{jun2023shape,
      title={Shap-E: Generating Conditional 3D Implicit Functions}, 
      author={Heewoo Jun and Alex Nichol},
      year={2023},
      eprint={2305.02463},
      archivePrefix={arXiv},
      primaryClass={cs.CV}

name: LimeWire
description: LimeWire was a free peer-to-peer file sharing program created in 2000. It was widely used for sharing pirated music and other files. It was discontinued in 2010.
fullDescription:
LimeWire



LimeWire was a free peer-to-peer file sharing client for Windows, macOS, Linux, and Solaris.[1] Created by Mark Gorton[2][3][4] in 2000, it was most prominently a tool used for the download and distribution of pirated materials, particularly pirated music.[5] In 2007, LimeWire was estimated to be installed on over one-third of all computers globally.[6]


LimeWire 4.18.3 on Windows Vista
Developer(s) | Lime Wire LLC
Initial release | May 3, 2000; 25 years ago(2000-05-03) [...] LimeWire was the second file sharing program after FrostWire to support firewall-to-firewall file transfers, a feature introduced in version 4.2, which was released in November 2004. LimeWire also now includes BitTorrent support, but is limited to three torrent uploads and three torrent downloads, which coexist with ordinary downloads. LimeWire 5.0 added an instant messenger that uses the XMPP Protocol, a free software communication protocol. Users can chat and share files with individuals or a [...] Contents

Features

Written in the Java programming language, LimeWire can run on any computer with a Java Virtual Machine installed. Installers were provided for Apple's Mac OS X, Microsoft's Windows, and Linux. Support for Mac OS 9 and other previous versions was dropped with the release of LimeWire 4.0.10. From version 4.8 onwards, LimeWire works as a UPnP Internet Gateway Device controller in that it can automatically set up packet-forwarding rules with UPnP-capable routers.

name: trace.
description: "Trace" means a small sign or mark left by something that has passed. It can refer to any line, mark, or effect. Synonyms include "vestige" and "track."
fullDescription:
Middle English trace "a course, a mark left by something that passes," from early French trace (same meaning), from tracer (verb) "to sketch, show by drawn lines," derived from Latin tractus, past participle of trahere "to pull, drag"  — related to abstract, attract, trace entry 3, trait

Noun [...] trace

noun (1)

trace

verb

transitive verb

intransitive verb

trace

noun (2)

Synonyms

Noun (1)

Verb

trace, vestige, track mean a perceptible sign made by something that has passed. trace may suggest any line, mark, or discernible effect. 







         
                        the killer left no traces 





vestige applies to a tangible reminder such as a fragment or remnant of what is past and gone. [...] boulders that are vestiges of the last ice age      





track implies a continuous line that can be followed. 







         
                        the fossilized tracks of dinosaurs

trace, vestige, track mean a perceptible sign made by something that has passed.

trace may suggest any line, mark, or discernible effect.

vestige applies to a tangible reminder such as a fragment or remnant of what is past and gone.

name: Banani
description: Banani is an upscale neighborhood in Dhaka, known for luxury apartments and high-end businesses. It has a lake and is part of Ward No. 19. A notable event was the 2019 FR Tower fire that killed 19 people.
fullDescription:
Banani is an upscale residential and commercial neighbourhood and a thana of Dhaka.[3][4] It hosts five-star hotels, upscale restaurants, luxury apartments, international schools, and the offices of many local and multinational companies.[5][6] Banani is considered an important central business district, and its commercial landscape is among the most important in Dhaka, coming after the likes of the nearby financial district of Gulshan Avenue, Karwan Bazar, Tejgaon Industrial Area and downtown [...] Geography

Banani is located at 23°47′42″N 90°24′17″E﻿ / ﻿23.7950°N 90.4047°E﻿ / 23.7950; 90.4047. It has a lake called Banani Lake.[9][10] Korail slum is located on the border of Banani.[11] It is a part of Ward No. 19 of DNCC.[12][13][14]

History

In November 2016, the Dhaka North City Corporation demolished the home of former East Pakistan Governor Abdul Monem Khan.[15]

In 2019, 19 were killed in the FR Tower fire.[16]

Population

name: AI Color Match
description: AI Color Match uses AI to transfer colors from one photo to another. It detects and maps colors accurately. It works on any device with internet access.
fullDescription:
AI color match refers to the use of artificial intelligence technology to match look and transfer colors. It is about advanced Evoto AI color grading algorithms to quickly extract the color grades of a reference photo and apply it to another image with one click. It can match looks, transfer styles, and map local colors precisely. [...] Looking for image style transfer to improve the texture of real estate, automotive, or interior design advertising photos? Evoto AI Color Match ensures professional, uniform, and branded photo for your industries. Enhance visual punch, making products advertising impressive for consumers.
Personal & Social Media Content [...] Q
How does Evoto AI color grading work?
A
Evoto AI Color Match uses AI color grading algorithms to detect colors in ref photos. For example, it identifies and analyzes people and objects in the reference image. Then, it maps the corresponding local colors and transfers their color styles. With one click, you can apply the style and fine-tune for a coherent look.
Q
Can I use Evoto on a mainly used device?

name: Figma AI
description: AI features integrated into Figma for design automation, asset generation, and workflow optimization.
fullDescription: Figma AI represents the next evolution of collaborative design, bringing artificial intelligence directly into the design workflow used by millions of professionals worldwide. The AI features include automated design suggestions, smart component generation, intelligent layout assistance, and content-aware resizing that maintains design integrity across different screen sizes. Figma AI can analyze your design patterns and suggest improvements, generate design systems components, and even help with accessibility compliance. For teams, it offers intelligent design review capabilities and can automatically generate design specifications for developers. The AI integration feels natural within Figma's interface, enhancing rather than replacing the designer's creative process. Whether you're prototyping mobile apps, designing websites, or creating design systems, Figma AI helps streamline repetitive tasks while maintaining the collaborative features that make Figma indispensable for design teams.

name: Canva AI
description: AI-powered design tools within Canva for creating graphics, presentations, and marketing materials.
fullDescription: Canva AI integrates powerful artificial intelligence capabilities into the world's most popular design platform, making professional-quality design accessible to everyone. The AI features include Magic Design for instant layout generation, Background Remover for seamless image editing, Magic Eraser for object removal, and Text to Image for custom graphics creation. Canva AI excels at understanding design principles and can automatically suggest layouts, color schemes, and content arrangements that follow best practices. With access to millions of templates, stock photos, and design elements, Canva AI can quickly generate social media posts, presentations, flyers, and marketing materials that look professionally designed. It's perfect for small businesses, marketers, educators, and anyone who needs to create compelling visual content quickly without extensive design experience.

name: Stable Diffusion
description: Open-source AI image generation model that can run locally or through various online platforms.
fullDescription: Stable Diffusion stands out as the premier open-source AI image generation model, offering unprecedented flexibility and control to users. Unlike proprietary solutions, Stable Diffusion can be run locally on your own hardware, giving you complete privacy and unlimited usage without subscription fees. The model supports extensive customization through various checkpoints, LoRAs, and fine-tuning options, allowing users to create highly specialized versions for specific art styles, subjects, or use cases. With a thriving community of developers and artists, Stable Diffusion has spawned numerous user interfaces, extensions, and improvements. Whether you're a developer wanting to integrate AI art generation into your applications or an artist seeking complete creative control, Stable Diffusion provides the foundation for limitless experimentation.

name: Midjourney
description: Popular AI art generator known for creating artistic and stylized images through Discord bot interface.
fullDescription: Midjourney has revolutionized the AI art space with its distinctive approach to image generation through a Discord bot interface. Known for producing highly artistic and stylized images, Midjourney has become the go-to choice for artists and creators seeking unique, painterly aesthetics. The platform excels at creating images with rich textures, dramatic lighting, and artistic flair that often surpasses photorealistic generation in terms of visual impact. With its community-driven approach, users can learn from each other's prompts and techniques, making it both a tool and a creative learning environment. Midjourney's strength lies in its ability to interpret artistic styles and create images that feel like they could hang in a gallery.

name: DALL-E 3
description: OpenAI's advanced AI image generator that creates detailed images from text descriptions with improved safety and accuracy.
fullDescription: DALL-E 3 represents a significant leap forward in AI-powered image generation technology. Built by OpenAI, this advanced system can understand nuanced requests and translate them into remarkably detailed and accurate images. The model has been designed with enhanced safety measures to reduce harmful content generation while maintaining creative freedom. DALL-E 3 excels at understanding context, style preferences, and complex scene compositions, making it an invaluable tool for artists, designers, marketers, and content creators. Whether you're looking to create concept art, marketing materials, or explore creative ideas, DALL-E 3 offers unprecedented capability in transforming textual descriptions into visual reality.
